title: First Ride: The Ventum GS1 Gravel Bike Sticks to The Go-Fast Formula
content:
In a sea of gravel bikes that are increasingly more like mountain bikes, the Ventum GS1 sticks to its go-fast, straight line speed formula.

Read the full article at First Ride: The Ventum GS1 Gravel Bike Sticks to The Go-Fast Formula on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
